Retrieve Institutional HCPCS Claims

Source: R/get_IN_HCPCS.R
get_IN_HCPCS.Rd

Searches institutional claim files for specified HCPCS codes in specified years. Supports filtering by HCPCS and optionally by USRDS_IDs. Handles CSV, SAS, and Parquet formats.

Usage

get_IN_HCPCS(hcpcs_codes = NULL, years, usrds_ids = NULL)

Arguments

hcpcs_codes

Optional character vector of HCPCS codes to search for. If NULL, all codes are returned.

years

Integer vector of years to include.

usrds_ids

Optional vector of USRDS_IDs to filter to specific patients.

Value

A data frame with columns: USRDS_ID, CLM_FROM, HCPCS, REV_CH, REVPMT, HCFASAF

Details

If hcpcs_codes is NULL, all HCPCS-coded claims are returned.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
get_IN_HCPCS(c("J1234", "A4567"), years = 2012:2016)
get_IN_HCPCS(NULL, years = 2012:2016)  # All HCPCS claims
}
